Package no.ntnu.iir.bluej.extensions.linting.core.violations

Class ViolationManager

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.iir.bluej.extensions.linting.core.violations.ViolationManager
public class ViolationManager extends Object
Represents a Violation manager. Responsible for managing violations and notifying listeners when violations change. Also handles mapping between file paths and BlueJ Class instances.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Constructs a new Violation manager.

  • Method Details

    • addViolations

      public void addViolations(String fileName, List<Violation> violations)
      Adds an entry containing a files violations. Notifies listeners that violations have changed.
      Parameters:
      fileName - a String representing the name of the file.
      violations - a List of violations found in the file.

    • getViolations

      public List<Violation> getViolations(String fileName)
      Returns a list of violations for a specific file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - a String representing the name of the file.
      Returns:
      a List of violations for a specific file.

    • setViolations

      public void setViolations(String fileName, List<Violation> violations)
      Updates an entry containing a files violations. Notifies listeners that violations have changed.
      Parameters:
      fileName - a String representing the name of the file.
      violations - a List of the violations found in the file.

    • removeViolations

      public void removeViolations(String fileName)
      Removes violations for a file and notifies the listeners of the change.
      Parameters:
      fileName - a String representing the name of the file.

    • clearViolations

      public void clearViolations()
      Clears violations for all files and notifies the listeners of the change.

    • addListener

      public void addListener(ViolationListener listener)
      Adds a new listener to the list of listeners.
      Parameters:
      listener - a ViolationListener to add to the list of listeners.

      public void removeListener(ViolationListener listener)
      Removes a listener from the list of listeners.
      Parameters:
      listener - a ViolationListener to remove from the list of listeners.

    • syncBlueClassMap

      public void syncBlueClassMap() throws bluej.extensions2.ProjectNotOpenException, bluej.extensions2.PackageNotFoundException
      Synchronizes the blueClassMap with the BClasses in the current package.
      Throws:
      bluej.extensions2.ProjectNotOpenException - if the BlueJ project was not opened
      bluej.extensions2.PackageNotFoundException - if the Package was not found

    • getBlueClass

      public bluej.extensions2.BClass getBlueClass(String filePath)
      Gets a BlueJ Class instance from a files path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path of the file to find a BlueJ Class from
      Returns:
      the found BlueJ Class instance or null
